Revert "RDMA/core: Fix ib_qp_usecnt_dec() called when error"

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.16.19 by commit eed4e3e752c2f8dfa290d3cd872e2945d30b46e7, it was introduced in version v5.16.19 by commit c62452bd75f59b13019d3f4ce508a30949fb6375. For more details please see the references link.
summary: Revert "RDMA/core: Fix ib_qp_usecnt_dec() called when error"
